title: Stranded 2 Survival Game- D1g1t4l 12ec0n
description:
|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||

1. UnRAR.
2. Browse to directory.
3. Locate and launch stranded.exe.
THATS IT!

This is probably one of the best free ware games I have ever played. This game is about a little man(you) who buys a new yacht and wants to take it boating, but in excitement you drift into unknown waters, and get shipwrecked on an island due to a ferocious storm. Its up to you to build a campsite, then eventually you... Okay I\\\&#039;ve told you enough about this game now download it! Trust me its the greatest I can\\\&#039;t decide whether to play Battlefield 2 or this. But heres a helpful hint: go to menu(Esc) then use a branch and a stone, click the plus sign, and Wala`! A hammer. You can figure the rest out thought by thinking of it or looking on the internet.

*There is no serial needed for this game*
*Be sure to unrar these files.*
